title: Circuit Symbol Flashcards
description: Interactive flashcard trainer for learning circuit schematic symbols with flip animation, category filtering, and quiz mode. Covers 16 essential symbols including resistors, capacitors, inductors, voltage/current sources, and connection symbols.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Electrical Engineering
Circuit Analysis
Electronics
learningObjectives: Recall the names of common circuit schematic symbols
Identify circuit components by their schematic symbols
Explain the basic function of each component type
prerequisites: Familiarity with voltage, current, and resistance

controls.name: Category
controls.description: Filter symbols by category (All, Passive, Sources, Connections, Active)

assumptions: US-style resistor symbols are primarily shown, with EU variant included
limitations: Does not include all possible circuit symbols
